itinerary.morning: Arrive at JFK Airport, transfer to hotel. Explore Times Square.
itinerary.afternoon: Lunch at Carmine's (Italian, family-style). Visit the accessible Top of the Rock observation deck.
itinerary.evening: Dinner at Keens Steakhouse, Broadway show.

itinerary.morning: Visit the Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island (accessible ferry).
itinerary.evening: Dinner at The Smith (American brasserie), explore Greenwich Village.

itinerary.morning: Visit the Metropolitan Museum of Art (accessible).
itinerary.afternoon: Lunch at Katz's Delicatessen. Explore Central Park by horse-drawn carriage.
itinerary.evening: Dinner at Peter Luger Steak House (Brooklyn), accessible by taxi.

itinerary.morning: Day trip to Watkins Glen State Park (partially accessible paths and views of the gorge and waterfalls).
itinerary.afternoon: Picnic lunch at the park, explore the accessible areas.
itinerary.evening: Return to NYC, dinner at a restaurant of choice.

itinerary.morning: Visit the American Museum of Natural History (accessible).
itinerary.afternoon: Lunch at Shake Shack. Explore the accessible High Line park.
itinerary.evening: Dinner at a restaurant in Chelsea Market, visit the Comedy Cellar.

itinerary.morning: Visit the Intrepid Sea, Air & Space Museum (accessible).
itinerary.afternoon: Lunch at a food truck. Explore the accessible areas of Governors Island.
itinerary.evening: Farewell dinner at a restaurant with a view of the city skyline.

itinerary.afternoon: Brunch at a restaurant of choice.
itinerary.evening: Transfer to JFK Airport for departure.
